input.sentences: we all went to the convention center for the event tonight .
there were a lot of people already there .
they had a lot of tasty food to eat .
we met a lot of new people .

output.sentences: She had to get ready for the awards ceremony.
There were a lot of people at the ceremony.
Everyone was having a good time.
The awards that were given were well deserved.
